listing.listing_description:
Villa Susanna sits amid 3 acres of lush green foliage at the tip of a headland overlooking Marigot Bay. Classic Caribbean architecture blends with European refinement in the four buildings that make up this luxurious estate. Guests will be treated to stunning views of Marigot Bay, the turquoise Caribbean Sea and neighboring islands that dot the horizon.

A covered patio of rich hardwood wraps the rear of the home. Lounge chairs and a hammock present tempting options for breezy afternoons spent under its eaves. A deck surrounds the immense 65 ft pool, where you can soak up the sun, encircled by a tropical lawn and palms. An impressive wooden bridge crosses over the pool to the sunset gazebo. Gather your guests around its 14 person glass table at dusk and watch the sun set on another perfect day. A brick pizza oven is found on a private patio off the kitchen. Winding paths will lead you down to the sandy Trou Roland beach where you’ll find a barbecue and tables.

The open-concept living room/dining room is a sight to behold. Columns, vaulted ceilings, wood-paneled flooring and decadently soft furnishings make it half-cathedral, half-pleasuredome. Settle into a settee and enjoy a movie on the flatscreen television. When dinner is ready guests can gather around the custom wood dining table. Chef service is available five days a week, but the professionally appointed kitchen may inspire you to take matters into your own hands.

Susanna’s seven bedrooms are spread among three cottages and an apartment each with its own wet bar and sitting area. Every room is individually fitted with fine linens, custom and antique furnishings as well as beautiful louver windows and sliding doors. Private gardens and decks flank two of the cottages and every bedroom has an en-suite bathroom adorned with quality materials and fixtures.

Sailing is the lifeblood of Marigot Bay and you’ll have no trouble chartering a boat for an excursion to the famous Pitons or just for whipping around the bay. When you’re back on land, you’ll find several good dining options in town. Shoppers will enjoy a day trip to Castries and the duty free Pointe Seraphine.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Villa Calafia del Mar is an extraordinary Los Cabos home outside San José del Cabo, situated in the El Encanto de la Laguna residential community on the breathtaking East Cape. Perched on a slope within easy walking distance of East Cape Beach, the colonial-style home enjoys panoramic views of the Sea of Cortez. Its 3,500 square feet of living space is superbly appointed with resort-style amenities, including a hot tub, infinity pool with swim-up bar, and both indoor and alfresco kitchens and dining areas. Three king bedroom suites plus a kid-friendly bunk room form an ideal haven for families and destination wedding guests.

Expansive outdoor living areas invite you to savor the open-air delights of this Mexican jewel. Soothe your muscles in the voluminous hot tub, and sip delicious drinks from the palapa bar while bathing in the pool. Sunbathe on plentiful loungers or drift into a sweet siesta in the hammock. Gather for alfresco meals and cocktails on the veranda, and stay toasty by the fire pit under the scintillating stars.

The living room is spacious and cozy, with comfortable sofas facing a flat-screen TV beneath lovely peaked ceilings with charming wood beams. Gourmet enthusiasts will adore the villa's kitchen, fully equipped with chef-grade appliances and serving multiple sea-view dining areas. Wide glass doors inhale the sea-kissed breeze into the home. A poker table, Apple TV, and Sonos sound system provide ample entertainment.

Each of the three king suites enjoys ocean views. Two open to the terrace and one opens to a lovely balcony. All three are superbly appointed for couples or individual travelers, including deluxe ensuite bathrooms. The children's suite overlooks the garden and includes a two-person bunk bed and private ensuite bathroom.

Villa Calafia del Mar balances privileged privacy and convenient location in one of Baja California's most beautiful settings. Walk about 650 meters to East Cape Beach, or play a round at nearby Puerto de Los Cabos Golf Course, featuring nine holes designed by Jack Nicklaus and nine by Greg Norman. Venture about twelve kilometers to the bohemian-chic San José del Cabo, with its enchanting colonial buildings and superb art galleries.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Featured in Condé Nast Traveler and seen on the Today Show, Casa Mono Loco is an enchanting and special house inside the Los Suenos Resort and Marina. Designed by Costa Rica’s most renowned architect, Ronald Zurcher, it has a unique open-air layout, making it easy to fall in love with its breathtaking views of the bays of Jaco, Herradura and Nicoya. Not only is this luxury vacation rental set on its own private street in the exclusive Vista Tres Bahias gated community, it’s inside a private reserve that’s home to butterflies, sloths, capuchin monkeys, macaws, toucans and more of the birds for which Costa Rica is famous.

Wake up to the sounds of the monkeys and birds calling to each other on the grounds of the villa—a virtual botanical garden that’s tended by staff. Sip a cool refreshment on the pool deck as the villa’s private chef prepares your meal. As the sun climbs higher, stretch out on a lounge chair to bask or have a swim in the infinity pool overlooking the hillside and the bay below. In the evenings, set the mood with the Sonos sound system as you heat up the barbecue for dinner—or order delivery from one of the six Los Suenos Marina Village restaurants. There are several new Smart TVs in the living room and bedrooms to entertain in the evenings and, for your convenience, laundry facilities in the kitchen. Your stay at Casa Mono Loco includes a pass to the restaurant and private beach club and pool set aside for villa owners and their guests.

The villa’s focal point is a beautiful central pavilion with a thatched roof, open sides, sitting areas with invitingly rustic timber-based sofas, a glass-topped table for casual meals or games and a bar that’s open to the fully equipped, newly renovated kitchen, which is a joy to cook in. Stone columns and wood posts feel stately and sturdy, while orange and yellow wall tones are playful. Even the interior living spaces open to a lush interior courtyard and garden to bring the tropical landscape indoors.

Each of the three bedrooms at Casa Mono Loco has an en-suite bathroom and stunning views of Herradura Bay. In the main house, there are two bedrooms with two double beds each, one of which opens directly to the terrace. The two suites are located on opposite sides of the house and separated by the interior courtyard for added privacy. The master suite, which has a king bed, is located in a stand-alone casita so you can take a mini-honeymoon or romantic getaway during your vacation. Relax on the large private furnished terrace and sink into the daybed that looks directly out to sea. While in any of the three bedrooms, you can opt to listen to birdsong or stream music through the wireless speakers.

Though Casa Mono Loco feels as though it’s miles from the rest of the world, it’s just five minutes from the world famous Los Suenos Marina where sport fishing yachts are available for daily charter. The Marina is host to the annual Los Suenos Signature Triple Crown sponsored in January, February and March. This year, records were once again broken when over the nine days of competition an astounding 6,570 bill fish were released. Travelers from around the world come to vacation at Los Suenos to experience this Pacific fishery that produces some the most highly sought after sailfish and marlin bites on the planet.

In addition to the Marina, you can always explore the shops, restaurants and spa, in the Los Suenos Marina Village. Or, book a tee-time at Los Suenos' eco friendly Marriott La Iguana Golf course. If you’d like to see more of the area, make the six mile drive to the beach town of Jaco or the eleven mile drive to Playa Hermosa. At the end of your stay, plan on a fifty-three mile drive from the casa to Juan Santamaria Airport.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
One of Jamaica’s most enchanting villas, Endless Summer is a turreted mansion with red roofs and breathtaking views of the Caribbean Sea. A sweeping white stone staircase curves gracefully from the foyer to a gallery balustrade encircling the living room topped by the highest dome of this spectacular vacation rental. Just minutes from idyllic golf courses and attractions including Rockland’s Bird Sanctuary and the luminescent Glistening Waters, experience Jamaica in style with Luxury Retreats!

The palatial grounds at Endless Summer include a lovely swimming pool and a separate hot tub. With an alfresco dining area for ten, an outdoor kitchen, a barbeque and a wet bar, this property is a dream come true for the magnanimous entertainer or a family holiday. Bose speakers throughout provide surround sound in the villa, on the verandahs and balconies and by the pool. Your reservation includes chef, housekeeping and butler services.

The interiors showcase mushroom-colored walls crisply trimmed in white. Mediterranean-style floors were custom made on-site, creating an overall palate of soft minimalistic colors. On fine Lenox china, dinners will be served in the downstairs dining alcove, north verandah or on the upstairs balcony as the sun sets over the sea. From the gallery, as from the bedrooms, a wall of glass doors opens to the deep wraparound porch and vistas over the golf course and the turquoise waters on the horizon.

Seven gorgeous bedrooms accommodate up to sixteen guests at this non-smoking villa. Four sleeping quarters are located in the main house, each with a balcony. The carriage house offers two bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and can also make a great bet for the couple on honeymoon. Alana's Retreat accomodates four guests over 18 years and older in two queen size beds. The master suite in the main house features a king sized bed, dual vanity, jetted tub, walk-in closet and lounge area.

Downtown Montego Bay and the hip strip are just fifteen minutes away from Endless Summer. Half Moon with its private beach, tennis, fitness center, water sports and dolphin lagoon is only five minutes downhill. This spacious residence has also become a favorite for hosting fantasy tropical weddings. From a marriage ceremony on the upper balcony with adequate space for many guests, to a grand reception on the wide verandah, to the dramatic tossing of the bridal bouquet from the upper gallery – say, “I do!”

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that the upstairs terrace will only be available Fall 2018. Please inquire with a Villa Specialist for more details.

The moment you arrive in the villa’s stunning courtyard; you are in paradise. It’s a perfect stage for this stylish contemporary home with mesmerizing views. Lush gardens are filled with the fragrance of jasmine, colorful allemande and vivid bougainvillea anchored with magnificent palms. The covered walkway, as beautiful in daylight as in night time, is flanked on either side with small pools planted with tropical water foliage. Enter the double door and the panoramic view spreads before you like a dramatic mural. From the main terrace, the sweeping vistas stretch from La Samanna on Long Bay Beach westward to Plum Bay Beach; from the roof top lounge it is 360. The photogenic sunsets are simply spectacular.

The layout takes full advantage of the villa’s visual assets. Deep covered loggias, supported by soft grey concrete columns, and sunning terraces flow around the house. Dining and lounging areas are strategically positioned to observe the view. The stunning infinity pool coils like a nautilus shell into an infinity jet tub.

The interiors seamlessly connect with the exterior spaces. Floor to ceiling glass pocket doors open completely to the outside. The spacious open plan living and dining room, with unusual high vaulted ceilings, belongs in a design magazine. Sleek, elegant furnishings in grey, taupe, and cream are accented with pops of color. Vibrant modern art appears in every room adding visual interest. A modern gourmet kitchen opens to the view, connecting the chef with the guests.

The three bedrooms are equal in size, spacious, and comfortable. Each room has private indoor and outdoor seating. The décor is clean and modern, schemed in taupe, grey and white each room with an individual color scheme. The spa bathrooms are stunning in tumbled travertine, Indonesian river rocks and sleek fixtures. Walk in showers flow into outdoor showers with sea views.

Although very secluded, you are very close to amenities. Long Bay and Plum Bay beach are nearby. 10 minute drive brings you to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case; 30 to Philipsburg’s shopping haven and a mere 10 to the airport.

listing.listing_description:
Celebrate a special anniversary, family reunion or destination wedding at Milestone. There’s no better place to revel in a landmark occasion than this Turks and Caicos vacation rental, with its backdrop of white sand and turquoise ocean and stunning Grace Bay location. Watch the sun play on the water from the oceanfront terrace or listen to the waves from the newly renovated interiors and four suite-style bedrooms.

Milestone makes it easy to enjoy the balmy weather with a resort-worthy heated pool, beachfront lounge area and bar, a barbecue and firepit and al-fresco dining for eight. The adventurous can explore on the provided bicycles; everyone else can claim a sunbed or take a stroll on the powdery sand. A housekeeper and butler will keep you comfortable during your holiday.

Bright, open interiors make a sophisticated setting in which to enjoy the luxury of everyone’s company. Window seats in the living and dining rooms are charming additions to the seating on the sectional and table for ten, and accents like nautical objets and underwater photography are playful, beachy touches. The large, fully equipped kitchen has both style and substance, with a practical island layout and a breakfast bar stocked with chic Louis Ghost stools.

All four bedrooms at Milestone have en-suite bathrooms, making each a private haven. There are two suites with king beds and ocean views that open to the terrace, and two bedrooms with two twin beds each.

Rated one of the best beach destinations in the world for its soft sands and clear, warm waters, Turks and Caicos is popular with everyone from honeymooners to families to golf-happy retirees. Milestone sits on Grace Bay, one of the top-ranked beaches, close to the market, marina, golf, and shopping and dining along the row of resorts. Don’t miss nearby Princess Alexandra National Park, a marine preserve with incredible snorkeling, wind sports and postcard-perfect views.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Near the Caribbean’s gourmet paradise - Grand Case - sits the exclusive, very private enclave of Mont Choisy, home to the stylish Happy Bay Villa. The home’s elegant entrance, with lush tropical gardens and stunning native boulders, creates an inviting stage for this classic French Creole home dressed in soft yellows and trimmed with elegant dark wood details.

Entering the villa, the stunning panoramic views dazzle with a brilliant sweep of tropical green mountains and endless blue sea and sky. Anguilla is on the horizon. Just below the deck you see waves crashing on the beach. Surrounding the villa are colorful gardens filled with tropical flowers as well as papaya and banana trees. The blue endless heated pool connects the amazing view to the villa. The spacious horseshoe shaped epi wood terrace is filled with outdoor dining and seating to enjoy the view and wonderful breezes. Little seating niches and a large covered gazebo offer quiet places to relax.

The interior great room, with spaces for seating and dining, is fully air condition or opens fully to the tropical breeze. Floor to ceiling glass doors bring in the view. Travertine floors run throughout the interiors. The recently renovated décor has an open and airy attitude in a mix of contemporary and exotic furnishings and accessories in teak woods and soft taupe and cream colors. The modern fully equipped kitchen, open to the view, is tastefully designed in glass tiles, stainless appliances and grey with pops of color.

The four bedrooms, with en-suite bathrooms, are off the main salon and under one roof. Each has interior and exterior doors for access to the pool, a small office/work space and fabulous sea views. Three bedrooms are accessible off a large media room with flat screen TV, perfect for teenagers are kids to share this wing of the villa. The master bedroom, located on the opposite side of the villa, is its own private oasis. Private for some but still connected given all bedrooms are under the same roof and all accessible from the inside. Each bathroom is uniquely designed in interesting mixes of materials and stylish fixtures plus they are fully air conditioned.

listing.listing_description:
Located within the exclusive community of Villa Del Mar, this brand new luxury resort is set on the sandy shores of Cabo Real Beach, just minutes from shopping, restaurants, and nightlife. From its scenic perch in the Solaz Los Cabos resort, Casa Sol captures amazing views of the Sea of Cortez from its open concept living room, balcony, and all three ensuite bedrooms. With the ease of a resort and the privacy of a luxury condo, Casa Sol is perfect for a family beach vacation, couples retreat, or a romantic honeymoon on Mexico’s beautiful Corridor.

Showing off its thoughtful decor, this spacious apartment features a soothing mixture of warm wood tones, elegant marble, and state of the art electronics and appliances. When the balcony doors are open, Casa Sol’s interior floods with fresh sea breeze and natural sunlight, and the barrier-free access to the outdoor lounge area add a delightful element to the social atmosphere. If you’re thinking of hosting, Casa Sol’s fully equipped kitchen, barbeque, and formal and alfresco dining areas are ready to handle any occasion. And, after dinner, you’ll love taking in the ocean view from the hot tub on the balcony.

During your stay, you’ll have full access to the shared amenities of the Solaz Resort, which includes the fitness center, beachfront swimming pools, and instant access to Cabo Real Beach. The apartment comes with two parking spots, Wi-Fi, air conditioning, television, and a sound system. And, daily housekeeping is available for the duration of your stay.

After you’ve spent a day or two soaking up the sun on Cabo Real Beach, venture a few kilometers off-resort to visit Chileno and Santa Maria Bay beaches. If you’re in the mood for a night on the town, San Jose del Cabo’s Main Square is a beautiful spot for a date. The square is lined with high-end restaurants, art galleries, and vibrant nightlife establishments.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

This extraordinary beachfront villa is located within the Beach Enclave community on the southeast shore of Providenciales Island. Situated directly on Long Bay Beach, the home features fabulous outdoor living and dining areas with panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea, as well as superbly appointed interiors with high-end audiovisual features and a gourmet kitchen. Your vacation rental includes an impressive array of services and guest perks both in-house and within Beach Enclave. Four king bedroom suites (plus a media room with pull-out sofa) accommodate families, destination wedding guests, and groups of friends up to ten in size.

The Beach Enclave villas are designed by SWA Architects and Domino Creative Interior Designers, with an emphasis on natural materials, sustainability, and harmony with the precious beauty of Turks and Caicos. The villa's ample terrace is perched within steps of the turquoise water, inviting you to sun-kissed days and dreamy evenings in the Caribbean breeze. Dip into the infinity swimming pool and relax on lovely lounge chairs beneath parasols. Descend to the beach’s soft sands and plunge into the luminous waves. Fire up the barbeque in the afternoon and relish an alfresco meal amid breathtaking vistas.

Pockets doors form a wall-to-wall threshold between the terrace and interior, inviting a delicious alfresco ambiance indoors. The luminous, open-concept space features a dining table for ten, comfortable sofas with ocean views, and a fully equipped kitchen with chef-grade appliances and a breakfast bar. Fresh white walls accentuate the exquisite wood accents and touches of sea-inspired artwork and décor.

The master bedroom includes a wide vanishing wall opening to a private furnished balcony with panoramic views. Its king bed is accompanied by a private sitting area and ensuite bathroom with dual vanity, walk-in shower, and soaking tub. The primary guest suite also enjoys a private, ocean-view balcony and deluxe ensuite bathroom with shower and tub. The other two guest suites include king beds and ensuite bathrooms with showers. There is a safe in each room and air conditioning throughout the villa.

The villa is within five kilometers of Provo Golf Club and Grace Bay Beach, and eight kilometers from Princess Alexandra National Park. Providenciales International Airport is less than fifteen kilometers away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Great Bluffs Estate is a fabulous luxury villa in the East End of Grand Cayman near Barefoot Beach. Nestled amid bluffs along the island's North Shore, the waterfront villa features a private beach for snorkeling and panoramic views of the Caribbean Sea. Accommodations for twelve and benefits from Silver Thatch Guest Services make it an excellent choice for families or large groups of friends seeking a stylish and private alternative to a hotel or resort. 

The recently renovated home projects a classic Caribbean character, with white stucco facades, a rooftop of cobalt-blue tile, and a terracotta motor court, while the luminous interiors and tastefully vibrant décor are freshly contemporary. The multi-tiered outdoor living areas feature two green-turf lawns as well as a lovely palapa and a wood gazebo. A freshwater pool invites you to a delicious plunge under the sun or moon, while the hammock welcomes afternoon siestas in the ocean breeze. Linger outdoors at sunset and at night for island cocktails in the lounge.

The home's spacious interiors inhale the sea-kissed air and exquisite island light through glass doors and plentiful windows. A cavernous, two-story great room features an ample lounge area with TV. A lovely salon extends from one side of the living room, while the other wing features the fully equipped kitchen and dining areas, including a luminous bay and a formal dining table for ten.

There are four suite-style bedrooms with ensuite bathrooms—two with king beds, two with queens—as well as two additional guestrooms that share a bathroom between them. The two king suites and one of the queen suites open to balconies and enjoy gorgeous ocean views. The master suite is ideal for couples, with a spacious lounge, a secluded desk area, and a cavernous bathroom with dual vanity and soaking tub perched beside a triptych of picture windows.

The waters off your private beach feature plentiful marine life and gentle currents for snorkeling, and are generally unvisited by tourists. For swimming, head to nearby Barefoot Beach—one of the island's finest. There are stores and restaurants just two kilometers down the road, and two nearby resorts offer myriad opportunities for watersports, dining, and play.

_ Please note that this region may be affected by shifting seasonal currents and weather patterns causing an influx of seaweed at the beach. _

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Step into your own corner of paradise at Casa Estrella, a luxury home in lush surroundings with beautiful views. Located behind the gates of the Four Seasons on the exclusive Peninsula Papagayo, this stunning Costa Rica vacation rental is just minutes from a premiere golf course, picturesque beaches and thrilling zipline courses. Five bedrooms spread between three buildings offer suite-style accommodations and the ultimate in private retreats.

Though the villa has ocean views from every room, you’ll want to spend your stay listening to the waves (and local fauna like the white-face monkeys) from the outdoor living and dining area, which features tables, chairs, loungers and a barbecue spread out around a custom infinity pool and hot tub. For entertainment, there’s Apple TV, Wi-Fi, indoor-outdoor surround sound and a wet bar. Guests even have the option to charter one of the property owner’s 38-foot fishing yachts at extra cost during their stay, where eight to ten friends or family can test their mettle on the tuna tower, relax in the air-conditioned cabin or chat with the English-speaking captain and two mates.

The open-plan living area is contemporary and neutral, with Asian-inspired pieces adding a touch of the exotic and bamboo, organic cottons, silk and stone adding natural textures. A sleek leather sectional flanks a lacquered console and media center in the living room, and green upholstery and rattan blinds in the adjacent dining room echo the vibrant landscape outside. The fully equipped kitchen has a striking breakfast bar with a natural stone base.

The five bedrooms at Casa Estrella are spread out among the main house and two separate guest suites. Each bedroom has an ensuite bathroom, air conditioning, and television, and opens to a terrace. In the two guest suites, you’ll find a bedroom with a king bed that feels like your own honeymoon-worthy haven within the villa. The main house has two bedrooms with a king bed and one with two single-over-double bunk beds.

During your holiday at Casa Estrella, be sure to book a tee time at the 18-hole, Arnold Palmer–designed golf course just a short walk away. Adventurous travelers can book a surf lesson against the famous backdrop of Witches Rock or paddle a canoe or sea kayak to one of Papagayo’s more secluded beaches, while beginning swimmers and children may enjoy the calmer waters of Playa del Coco. Nearby Playa Grande is another spot that’s not only popular with surfers, but with leatherback turtles as a nesting site.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
There are times at CieloMar, between the rambling words of your favorite author or the quiet meditations of your mind, when you will not be sure if you are aboard a ship or on a bride, walking on a dock or on a deck. With the Pacific Ocean to the west and an Arnold Palmer golf course to the east, the site design focuses every view towards the sea. The vantage point of a promontory three hundred feet above sea level has created opportunities for dramatic architecture and structural finesse.

At the end of the bridge, you feel as if soaring above the jungle and ocean. The bridge points to where the sun dips below the horizon each evening, making it the best spot for cocktail hour! Organizing the levels downward into the face of the cliff also presented the opportunity to cantilever the infinity swimming pool over the edge of the terrace, creating the illusion of swimming three hundred feet above the sea. The Olympic-sized pool is lined with charcoal-black volcanic lava stone, imparting a deep blue color to the water.

The ‘bow and arrow’ design of the house affords complete privacy. Air conditioned interior spaces open to the ocean views, as well as a large exterior covered loggia that functions as an outdoor living room to enjoy Costa Rica’s famous warm and mild weather while being protected from the equatorial sun. The super-panoramic vistas throughout the building have been achieved by curving the house in a semicircle around a radial point in front of the bridge.

Six stellar bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to ten guests with two staff members. A unique feature of the master suite is a completely private, sunken Zen garden with an outdoor shower. Fine linens and accoutrements provide splendid nights of rest.

Have a cruise around with the bicycles or head out to the links! The villa also offers a variety of watersports equipment for your use. During your stay at CieloMar, you will be just a five minute buggy ride to restaurants, shops, tennis and the spa. Beyond its unparalleled design, the perks at CieloMar include a home theater, a gym, a wet bar and two private studies. Ping pong and board games are also provided. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Arriving at the main gates of Casa de la Playa, our newest 5-bedroom beachfront villa, you will no doubt feel like a celebrity arriving at your very own private Caribbean estate.  The long cobblestoned driveway, lined by the lush and vibrant gardens, is everyone’s dream villa holiday entrance.  Walk through the front door and you immediately see the blues of the pool and the Caribbean Sea beyond.  Nothing can prepare you for what you will find behind the enormous iron gates of Casa de la Playa. 

The Great Room, with vaulted ceilings made from Brazilian Cherry hardwood, has large sliding glass doors that open to the al-fresco dining table, covered terrace and expansive pool deck.  Including a grand piano and billiard table, the Great Room also includes a large TV screen with surround sound all connected to the villa’s main theatre system which includes over 700+ downloaded movies & current TV shows.  Just off the Great Room you will find a fully equipped office including desktop computer and printer for guest use. 

The large gourmet kitchen, attached to the Great Room, is a chef’s dream and what better way to enjoy the kitchen than to have all your meals prepared by the in-house Chef and served by the villa’s Butler.  Your only worry is what is on the menu, not who will be cooking! 

The 5 bedrooms are laid out so they each enjoy beach views from their private access under the covered terrace.  The master bedroom, secluded from the Great Room, boasts 800 sq. ft of living space including a large ensuite bathroom with soaking tub and an immense rain shower.  The 4 other bedrooms, split 2 and 2 on either side of the Great Room, provide similar amenities with large garden view ensuite bathrooms.  Great for families, one bedroom provides 2 double beds, so the kids will not have to share.  With large vaulted ceilings like the Great Room, each bedroom is a private oasis. 

Take in the 400 ft. worth of west facing beach views from the pool, with diving board, or better yet from the villa’s rooftop patio with built-in daybed.  When the conditions are right you can see neighboring islands Saba, St. Eustatius and St. Kitts.  And if the property does not already offer enough in fun amenities, why not enjoy an outdoor movie from the villa’s garden.  Allow the caretaker to set it up for you and you can watch a recent release with your loved ones right under the stars. 

Located in the exclusive gated community of the Terres Basses on the French side of St-Martin, on the same beach as famed La Samanna resort, you are only 15 minutes to the Juliana International Airport, 15 minutes to the quaint Creole town of Marigot and a further 15 minutes to Grand Case, Hope Estate and Cul de Sac.

listing.listing_description:
Located inside the exclusive neighbourhood of Sandy Lane, this elegant estate is an ideal retreat for a group of friends or large family, making it one of our top Barbados villa rentals. When you travel to Barbados, you’ll experience the fine beaches, rich culture and pleasant climate the island is known for.

This estate is bursting with amenities—keep up your exercise regime in the villa’s equipped gym or play a round on the private tennis court. During the day, swim in the 58-foot, infinity-edge pool and then lounge on one of the sun chaises with umbrellas, or wander through the landscaped gardens. In the evening, the media room has a flatscreen with Apple TV, games, books and an entertainment bar.

Inside, this classy home features a minimalist but inviting ambiance with white décor, punches of colour, high-quality furnishings and vivid artwork. The spacious, open kitchen boasts all stainless steel appliances and modern cabinetry as well as an island with two wine coolers. Choose to enjoy a meal in the cozy dining area or in the more formal space, complete with a circular table under an iron chandelier. And there’s always the option of dining al fresco—the terrace has a dining gazebo as well as seating areas with plush couches and a crystal chandelier.

Up to 14 guests can comfortably stay here. The main home’s five bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms and have beds ranging from kings to twins. The master suite has a sitting area and views of the pool along with a private patio overlooking the golf course. It also boasts a king-sized bed, walk-in closet and an en-suite bathroom with marble tiling, a rain shower and a marble tub. Two more bedrooms with king beds are in the guest cottage.

As a guest, you’ll have access to Sandy Lane Beach Facility’s golf course and private beach cabana. Five minutes away are the high-end shops and fine dining options of Holetown.

listing.listing_description:
Gracefully-outfitted, spacious and with impeccable views, this Miami penthouse is the epitome of high living in the beachfront metropolis. Guests will love the high ceilings and gleaming marble surfaces, with a dramatic staircase descending to plush furniture, bold sculptures and tasteful decor. Modern and with great city access, Miami Beach and the Mary Brickell Village shopping hub are nearby.

Welcome bright Florida mornings from the balcony and wide windows of this home. As you set about your day, sunlight will illuminate the characterful carvings and sculptures of the home, with splashes of color punctuating a minimal, modern style. With centrally-controlled AC, relax in total comfort on the welcoming sofas, taking in the fully-equipped TV and entertainment system, which is rivalled by the dramatic Miami sky beyond. The wood-panelled, attractive kitchen is more than sufficient for self-catering, while the complex’s spa, gym and pool at your full disposal.

From your reserved parking spot, you can travel from the Conrad Penthouse to a range of locations in a handful of minutes. The much-loved expanses of Miami Beach and popular Key Biscayne are just a short ride away, while guests can dive into the shopping options of nearby Mary Brickell Village as well as Miami’s downtown. A huge number of highly-rated international restaurants are also just a short drive away, while waterfront bars are a tempting option after a day on the local strips, beaches and local golf courses.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that there is construction near the villa. Please enquire with one of our Villa Specialists for further details.

Welcome to Cayman Villa, a luxurious vacation home situated high on Sea Breeze Hills in Cap Estate. Cap Estate is a residential area with private homes and an 18 hole championship golf course, three hotels and restaurants and two beaches. Cayman Villa overlooks the Atlantic Ocean and is perfectly situated to enjoy the mind-blowing views of Martinique (on a clear day) and the lovely Atlantic breeze.

Just off the central living room is a media room with a 52 inch plasma television, DVD player and sound system. The sitting room opens out through glass doors onto a walkway with steps leading down to the large patio and pool area. Cayman Villa rests in beautifully landscaped gardens and has its own swimming pool. There’s also a media room and home theater system for entertainment at any time during your vacation in St. Lucia.

The entrance to the house leads into an open area which follows through to a well-equipped kitchen, dining room with a dining table for eight and a living room. The open space is made complete with a bar, stocked with a beer and wine cooler, ice maker and an array of glassware. A cook service is included, so you need not spend much time preparing meals.

The main house comprises three well established bedrooms with a fully self-contained cottage, adjacent to the house, which acts as the fourth bedroom. The spacious master bedroom suite has a four poster king size bed, flat screen television and en-suite bathroom with a shower and a bath. There are two more bedrooms – bedroom two has a king size bed and en-suite shower room and bedroom three has a king size four poster bed as well as en-suite facilities. The cozy cottage has a king size bed and an en-suite bath and shower room. The cottage is ideal as guest/in-laws quarters. It is located to the left of the main house and is separated by a foot path which allows for privacy if needed. The cottage has an open plan living and kitchen area, complete with microwave, electric cooker and fridge. It also has a charming patio area which looks out to the Atlantic Ocean.

When you decide to leave the villa to discover more of the local area, you’ll find the nearby town with restaurant, shopping and a grocery store caters for your needs.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All Rights Reserved.

Completed in December of 2014, this stunning 8,500 square foot luxury home features an infinity pool, large covered veranda, workout room, media room and 180 degree views of the ocean! With 4 bedrooms, including 3 king size beds, a bunk room that sleeps 8 and 3 1/2 baths. We can accommodate one, two or even three families.

Casa Symbiotica includes a luxury kitchen, living room, large outdoor covered veranda, outdoor kitchen, 2 car garage, laundry room, powder room, workout room, dining room and a sunken lounge area with 11 ft high pocket doors opening to an infinity pool with full Pacific Ocean view.  

The villa also includes a media room, master bedroom and bathroom, grand staircase, two guest bedrooms with a shared bathroom, laundry closet with an additional full size washer/dryer and a bunk bed room with full bath.

listing.listing_description:
Beach Enclave 4 is located along coveted International Drive, a prestigious cul-de-sac known for its designer homes. The area offers stunning views of Turks and Caicos’ North Shore, the protected Princess Alexandra National Park and the teeming barrier reef. This private neighborhood offers tranquility with low density and scant traffic. Right on the oceanfront of Babalua Beach and less than ten minutes from Grace Bay, you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate Caribbean holiday!

The combination of private beach access, easy and breezy living and magnificent views along with the vacation rental’s luxury services and management make this property a one-of-a-kind real estate opportunity in Providenciales. Beach Enclave 4 is generously embedded in the lush, natural vegetation of the islands with less than one home per acre. Outdoor perks include a swimming pool, an alfresco dining area for eight, a barbeque, fire pit, an outdoor shower and plenty of sun loungers. The private beach area is accessible via a carved limestone staircase.

High ceilings and a predominantly white decorative scheme keep the feelings light and bright at this magnificent holiday home. Subtle wooden accents in the great room help keep the atmosphere balanced and grounded. Enjoy dinner at the formal dining table that is uniquely hewn to preserve the original shape and grains of the tree. The fully equipped kitchen features a breakfast bar and an espresso machine. Wi-Fi access is free.

The four stunning bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. The two master suites feature king size beds, dual vanities, alfresco showers and balconies with ocean views. All of the suites offer television, ceiling fans.

Don’t forget – group yoga sessions are included with your reservation. Get into that meditative state you’ve been craving for so long! You will also be within easy driving distance of the Provo Golf Club. We recommend this villa for a family vacation, a decadent honeymoon or couples’ retreat or a special event such as a wedding or anniversary. Have your vacation, your way with Luxury Retreats!

Just below the crest of the mountain, off a dramatic drive, is Nid d’Amour. True to its French translation, Love Nest, the villa has been perfectly perched on the side of the hill to take full advantage of a truly spectacular view. Behind you are neighboring mountains; in front of you is the palm lined entrance to the villa. Enter the front door and a brilliant, variegated scene flows before you, painted in greens and blues. Within your scope are the tropical island mountains, Baie Rouge Beach and Marigot with its scenic marinas. To your left is Anguilla, so close you can touch it. The sightline stretches to Creole Rock in Grand Case and beyond to the Atlantic’s horizon. The sapphire sea, dotted with boats, is everywhere. Palms and sea grape and giant aloe frame the natural picture. It’s a perfect setting for a romantic tropical retreat.

The villa takes full advantage of the mesmerizing vistas with large terraces filled with covered spaces for dining and lounging. The heated infinity pool with built in jetted tub, framed by columns, visually flows into the sea. Head up to the roof terrace for truly unobstructed 360 degree views and gorgeous sunsets.

The interior’s tasteful sea inspired décor, in whites with touches of turquoise, compliments the view. The great room, with floor to ceiling glass doors, flows from the seating space into the charming French style kitchen which faces sea. Dine inside on the kitchen’s marble high top or in the splendid glass conservatory just off the kitchen; the view is the perfect backdrop for beautiful meals.

The spacious bedrooms connect to the main house. Both face the sea and have semi-private outdoor seating spaces. The décor, in taupe and white with turquoise, blends with the vistas. Each en suite bathroom is spa like blending white cabinetry with natural stone and glass tiles. Large walk in showers have Indonesian river pebble floors and upscale fixtures. One shower opens to the view facing Anguilla.

You are secluded yet close to amenities. It’s a short drive to Baie Rouge Beach. In 10 minute you reach the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops and galleries, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case and Philipsburg’s shopping haven. Only a short 10 minutes to access the international airport.

listing.listing_description:
Stone mosaics swirl up to the cobalt walls of this cliffside villa in Costa Careyes. Though it’s hidden from the outside world by 2 rock faces and palm-strewn gardens, this fully staffed retreat has panoramic Pacific views from its palapa-covered decks and infinity pool. When you’re ready to emerge from glorious seclusion, it’s 5 minutes to ceviche and cocktails at Playa Rosa Beach Club. 

Savor the sight of the sunlight sparkling on the ocean from beneath an umbrella on a lounger by the infinity pool, or follow a staircase down to a stone grotto and water access. Though the villa feels private—its name translates to “love nest,” after all—it’s connected to the rest of the world via Wi-Fi and satellite TV. 

The villa’s wave-like stone motifs and brilliant blue walls echo the natural Costalegre landscape of rock faces and cerulean sea. The main living and dining areas draw their inspiration from traditional homes of Mexico, housed in open-sided, palapa-covered pavilions. And while cook service is included in your holiday, there is a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. 

Each of the 3 bedrooms at this vacation rental is a honeymoon-worthy hideaway with a king bed, en-suite bathroom, air conditioning, and ocean views. Two of the bedrooms have their own balconies, and the third opens directly to the pool terrace. In contrast to the color-soaked common areas, the bedrooms have crisp white walls warmed up by wood accents. 

A stay at Nido de Amor gives you the luxury of popping down to the beach club for a fresh seafood lunch or cocktail hour by torchlight, with Playa Rosa just a 5-minute drive away. Make new friends around the pools at El Careyes Club, 8 minutes away, or bring the family for a match at Careyes Polo Club.

listing.listing_description:
Located in the much sought after Sugar Hill Resort community, Half Century House is an inviting Barbados luxury villa that offers breathtaking views of the sparkling Caribbean Sea. Just minutes from Gibbes and Sandy Lane Beach as well as the Royal Westmoreland Golf Course, you will be perfectly poised for the ultimate holiday in the sun!

The grounds at this exquisite vacation rental feature a palatial swimming pool as well as plenty of sun loungers. Anyone up for a barbeque? Hop into the shade of the gazebo for some lovely alfresco dining. The outdoor living area makes a great spot for a board game or just curling up with a good book. The interiors of Half Century House feature a formal dining area with seating for eight, Wi-Fi, air conditioning and baby equipment. Your reservation includes cooking, housekeeping and laundry services.

Inside this impeccable private home, tasteful, neutral tones interplay with the cool coral stone finishes to create an air of simple refinement, with a Caribbean twist. On the ground floor, the porte cochère ushers you into a welcoming foyer. The ground floor comprises a modern, well equipped kitchen, powder room and a sunken living room opening to a generous covered terrace which flows onto the pool deck. From here, a balustrade of coral stone steps lead down to the beautifully maintained tropical garden.

Six exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to twelve guests at this non-smoking villa. The comfortable master suite opens onto a private terrace, where magnificent views over the pool, gardens and sea beyond can be savored. For canoodling couples or older children who prefer to have more privacy, the self-contained cottage, located just off the pool deck, provides comfortable accommodation. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms, and access to the outdoors is a breeze.

Half Century House is ideally positioned within a minute’s walk of the resort clubhouse. Guests will enjoy access to the resort’s wide range of on-site amenities including floodlit tennis courts, a communal pool, the fitness facility, restaurants and 24-hour security. This villa makes a great bet for a family getaway, a corporate retreat, a dream wedding or even a decadent honeymoon. Enjoy the best of Barbados!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
This sprawling home is located on two acres of land beautifully manicured with lush tropical gardens, easily making it one of our top villas in Barbados. With four bedrooms, it also works perfectly for getaways with families or groups of friends traveling together. The island of Barbados offers visitors a unique tropical holiday thanks to its perfect climate, stretches of amazing beaches and its unique culture.

In the center of the villas landscaped grounds you’ll find a large swimming pool surrounded by comfy lounge chairs and a manicured lawn. There are two gazebos nestled in the tropical gardens; one features a small table perfect for an afternoon tea, while the other boasts a comfy lounge chair and ocean views. Under the cover of the terrace, just steps up from the pool, is a large dining table and seating area with tasteful patio furnishings. The villa also boasts a full-sized tennis court, a small fitness room, as well as a staff that includes a butler, two housekeepers and a chef.

The interior of this recently renovated home blends opulent furnishings and antiques with European and Caribbean artwork and decor creating a luxurious ambiance. The main salon, which leads out to the terrace, includes a seating area and a small circular table. For a night in, craft an island-inspired meal in the fully equipped kitchen, and dine on the formal Rococo-style dining room with a marble table and access to the gardens.

The estate’s four air-conditioned bedrooms extend the same attention to detail found throughout the villa with hand-painted furnishings, carefully selected artwork and fine-quality linens. Up to eight guests are welcome to stay, and each suite offers a private en-suite bathroom.

Spend time on the beach nearby, where you can enjoy snorkeling or just relaxing on the sand. For the avid golfer, the Royal Westmoreland golf course is a 5 km drive away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

Please note that this villa can be rented with: Leamington Cottage (https://www.luxuryretreats.com/vacation-rentals/caribbean/barbados/speightstown/leamington-cottage-113956)

listing.listing_description:
Set within the Sea Horse Ranch, this Caribbean villa offers a private, ocean view, ensuring that you'll have an unforgettable retreat in the Dominican Republic. Villa Casamare’s lush property is decorated with vibrant lawns, tropical plants, mature trees, and a relaxing terrace that is specifically positioned to capture incredible sunsets. Just a short walk from home, you’ll find the sandy shores of the resort’s private beach, and their oceanfront swimming pools.

Villa Casamare’s wraparound terrace enjoys access to the pool and lawn area under its pavilion-style covering. Moving inside, wall-length openings follow the contours of the terrace to seamlessly merging the terrace and living room, as well as inviting fresh ocean breeze and warm natural sunlight to fill Casamare’s interior spaces. In the living room, you’ll find designer furnishings, deep wood tones, and ocean-inspired turqouise accents. The fully equipped kitchen is outfitted with high-end applainces, a breakfast bar, and formal dining space with seating for six. After dinner, mix yourself a cocktail at the wet bar and head outside to enjoy another amazing Caribbean sunset.

Outside on the terrace, you’ll love cooling off in the swimming pool and enjoying alfresco meals with the scenic ocean view providing a one-of-a-kind background. If you’d rather hang out inside, curl up in the theatre room for a quiet movie night with the family, or catch the big game with friends on the living room’s Smart TV. When it’s time for bed, the master bedroom features a king bed, a walk-in closet, an ocean view, and a lavish en-suite bathroom with dual vanity and two standalone rain showers.

Sea Horse Ranch enjoys its own private beach, tennis and equestrian facilities, and an oceanfront restaraunt and swimming pool. If you’re in the mood to explore Sea Horse’s neighboring towns, you’ll find shopping, dining, and nightlife options seven-kilometers away in downtown Sosua, and even more in Puerto Plata.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
